question: Who of the following took additional charge of Madhya Pradesh?
explanation: Gujarat Governor Om Prakash Kohli was given the additional charge of Madhya Pradesh as the incumbent Governor, Anandiben Patel is on leave. In the past, Mr. Kohli held the additional charge of the office of Governor of Madhya Pradesh from 8th September 2016 to 19th January 2018. In January 2018, Anandiben, became the Governor of Madhya Pradesh.
